sentence: Ohio Congressman Jim Jordan, ranking member of House Judiciary, is right in the middle of all this and joins me now.
title: 'The Ingraham Angle' on Kamala Harris, Ketanji Brown Jackson

sentence: Lincoln Project co-founder Reed Galen suggested that Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA), Paul Gosar (R-AZ), and Jim Jordan (R-OH) were imagining themselves holding McCarthy's job.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Experts say Kevin McCarthy ‘stepped on a rake’ and ‘Greene, Gosar and Jordan are licking their chops’

author: LISA MASCARO
title: McCarthy, Trump have 'positive' call despite Jan. 6 audio

sentence: Kevin McCarthy on the phone with @RepLizCheney “I think this will pass, and it would be my recommendation you should resign.” pic.twitter.com/uk0sLDVdoa — Jean (@jeanvas5) April 22, 2022 This new audio belies McCarthy’s public face on January 6, where he strongly recommended an investigation into the Capitol attacks, then did an about-face after House Speaker Nancy Pelosi rejected the addition of Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan and Ind.
author: Jennifer Oliver O'Connell
title: GOP Leader Kevin McCarthy Caught on Tape; Says He Would Convince Trump That He 'Should Resign'

sentence: He has tried to temper his closest rivals, Rep. Steve Scalise of Louisiana and Rep. Jim Jordan of Ohio, even as he works to shore up the votes that would be needed to become speaker.
title: Audio reveals GOP leader Kevin McCarthy planned to urge Trump to resign after Jan. 6 attack

sentence: “As Congress continues to examine Big Tech and how to best protect Americans’ free speech rights, this letter serves as a formal request that you preserve all records and materials relating to Musk’s offer to purchase Twitter, including Twitter’s consideration and response to this offer, and Twitter’s evaluation of its shareholder interests with respect to Musk’s offer,” said the letter, led by Ranking Member Jim Jordan, R-Ohio.
author: Missy Crane
title: GOP Just Came Out Swinging Against Twitter’s Woke Board…They’re Officially On Notice

sentence: Representative Matt Gaetz appeared to mull Representative Jim Jordan as a possible replacement for House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy following the release of audio where McCarthy said he was considering advising then-President Donald Trump to resign.
author: Darragh Roche
title: Matt Gaetz Mulls Jim Jordan as New GOP Leader Following McCarthy Audio Leak

sentence: Friday: Then, hard-right Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) gave testimony in a challenge to her candidacy over her alleged participation in efforts to overturn the 2020 election, claiming that she thought that rioters breaking into the Capitol on January 6, 2021, were members of “antifa or BLM.” Friday afternoon: Politico published photos showing Cawthorn, who claims he lives by traditional Christian values, drinking and wearing women's lingerie at a party, which he later defended as “goofy vacation photos during a game on a cruise.” Friday night: Yet more troubling news broke when the January 6 committee filed deposition excerpts alleging several prominent House Republicans, including Reps. Jim Jordan (Ohio), Louie Gohmert (Tex.)
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Kevin McCarthy’s Awful Few Days: Embarrassing Leaks—And More Unwanted Cawthorn And Marjorie Taylor Greene Stories
